dcterms:creator: Brian Skyrms
dcterms:description: The Stag Hunt is a strategic game that illustrates the social contract, where two hunters must decide whether to cooperate to hunt a stag or act independently to hunt a hare.
dcterms:title: Stag Hunt

dcterms:creator: Brian Skyrms
dcterms:description: The Prisoners Dilemma is a classic example of a game that illustrates the conflict between self-interest and cooperation, where two prisoners must decide whether to confess or remain silent.
dcterms:title: Prisoners Dilemma

dcterms:creator: Marianna Belloc
Ennio Bilancini
Leonardo Boncinelli
Simone Dâ€™Alessandro
dcterms:description: This dataset contains experimental data from a study on intuition and deliberation in the Stag Hunt game, comparing reflexive and reasoned choices made by participants.
dcterms:title: Belloc et al. (2019) Experiment Data
